text:
UNIVERSITY OF KENTUCKY
LEXINGTON, KENTUCKY
September 26, 1962
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
Mr. William G. Harley
President
NAEB
Dupont Circle Building
1346 Connecticut Avenue, N. W
Washington 6, D. C.
Dear Bill:
So long as I know the nature of the delay I am in no
hurry . . . quite the contrary. The longer the decision
is put off the easier it may be to make.
"Sinecure," huh? 1*11 overlook that but only because
I'm smaller than you are.
I checked with a few of the Authority regarding November
for the ETV seminar here. There is strong indication
the first part of December might be better. This is to
ask about your schedule the first two weeks in December.
The full Authority meets October 16 and I hope to tie it
down then.
Many thanks for your good offices. Bill.
Best,
0. Leonard Press
Head
P,S. That was a darn good answer to Moley. And an
equally superb position paper regarding WNDT-AFTRA.
Yes, will be there for pre and post convention board
meetings.
SEP 28 1962
